alert.note: Alert for Berkeley; Charleston; Dorchester (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 30 at 5:10PM EST until December 30 at 5:45PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM EST FOR PORTIONS OF CHARLESTON...BERKELEY AND DORCHESTER COUNTIES... At 509 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Summerville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include: North Charleston, Summerville, Goose Creek, Ladson, Sangaree, Crowfield Plantation, Knightsville and College Park. This warning includes I-26 between mile markers 196 and 205. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so.
